channel.title: [PI] Need help adding in donator rank!
channel.description: Is there any tutorial specifically written for PI on how to add in donator rank. I saw a few out there, but people seem to say they aren't that good or it doesn't look like it was designed for PI. If possible, both server and client side would be appreciated. I need to know how to add the status and the icon.

item.title: [PI] Need help adding in donator rank!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428947.msg3149254.html#msg3149254 for the icon.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Need help adding in donator rank!
